context.p: Prose.io is a content editor that can be used to post in Github repositories. This task requires the user to have already set up a Github account.

step.cmd: Enter Prose.io into your browser's URL address bar.
step.stepresult: The Prose.io website will prompt you to "Authorize on Github"

step.cmd: Select the "Authorize on Github" button and log in to your Github account.
In Prose.io, navigate to the folder you'd like to post inside.
